name: Project Javatale
description:
Project Javatale is an action-adventure inspired by the Legend of Zelda series with deep and artistic influence of batik artwork delivered through exploration of  inter-connecting area of non linear levels based on actual Indonesian locations. 

In his effort to release an ancient evil, demon Meghanada wiped off most colors from the once wondrous world. 
As a soldier from Jayanasa Kingom player will have to restore the worlds' colour and uncover the truth hidden by the gods.

This demo gives an idea of how an area of the game feels. The full game will feature quite a few places based on well- known scenic areas in Indonesia, especially in Java, and more ethnically themed dungeons and boss fights.
